title: Battle Bunny Talon

It's honestly really scary.

replies.body: End the "gender stereotype struggle." Men can be bunnies too!
You don't have to be male or female to be a bunny! {{champion:432}}

Awwww I would love Battle Bunny Bard (3b for short)!

Imagine it 3B having cute little bunny ears and a big belly spot and the portals would be rabbit holes and the heals would be carrots growing and the ult would be a bunny icon and--------- *collapses from cute overload*
SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY
Well at least it'd be less terrifying than Cottontail Fizz... -shudder-
Imagine his little meeps following him around.
Meeps = Easter eggs
SOMEONE TELL RITO TO MAKE THIS SKIN!
Battle Bunny Taric where?
That would be... Outrageous. Truly.
{{champion:17}} {{champion:105}}
I would buy it.

I would too, but unless Riot does a full BB line, I'd rather give him another animal.

BB line up though: {{champion:92}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:432}}

The only problem I have with this picture is the dimensions of Talon's body. Going by his other skins, he's a pretty buff guy. He's got a strong build, I mean, his voice is easily one of the most manliest in the games. This splash makes him look really thin and toned, instead of strong. He needs to keep his physique.
10/10 would buy this skin
